Love hate relationship with this game:

Love it because of the intense competitiveness and focus that the devs have done a great job with, and the guns are so unique and satisfying to shoot.

Hate it because I had to win so many games in a row just to get to Silver 2, and sometimes when you dump an entire mag of ammo into someone point blank and you only get damage dealt 1 for 13 dmg

VERY FUKCING FUN AND YET BROKEN
Um jogo bem cooperativo e bem legal de se jogar, nÃ£o enjoa de jogar mesmo sendo partidas quase iguais, mesmo tendo muitos hacks eu acho muito bom e recomendo bastante.

Engage in a brand-new style of assault using an unrivaled level of destruction and gadgetry.
On defense, coordinate with your team to transform your environments into strongholds. Trap, fortify and create defensive systems to prevent being breached by the enemy.
On attack, lead your team through narrow corridors, barricaded doorways and reinforced walls. Combine tactical maps, observation drones, rappelling and more to plan, attack and defuse every situation.
Very cool it has a few bad parts like the hackers Valve not caring but at the end of the day it is Interesting
